name: PewDiePie in Bromancing The Stone
description:
Dillon the Hacker has kidnapped Marzia and hacked your YouTube channel. Can Pewds find him in time to prevent Dillon's evil plan of world domination from succeeding? Along the way he'll have a little help from Jack, Mark, Ken, and Senpai Barrel as he does battle with SlendyMan & Ultimo Dillon. Save your girlfriend, Youtube, and maybe even the world!

Created during the month of June 2016 for the PewDiePie RPG Maker contest.

Playable in web browsers, or on windows via download.

Controls

XBOX Remote - best!

Touchscreen

Mouse

Keyboard

z - used for checking objects

x - used for menu

up, down, left, right - used for movement
